snippet: The notion that a single race can determine the superior competitor had already seemed less sturdy in horse racing when Seabiscuit beat War Admiral in 1938.
lead_paragraph: The notion that a single race can determine the superior competitor had already seemed less sturdy in horse racing when Seabiscuit beat War Admiral in 1938.

headline.main: Despite High Hopes, Match Races Rarely Meet Expectations
headline.print_headline: Despite High Hopes, Match Races Rarely Meet Expectations
